## Installation

### First-time install
```bash
/plugin marketplace add smileynet/line-cook
/plugin install line@line-cook
```

### Update existing installation
```bash
/plugin update line
```

## What's Changed
<!-- List changes here -->

## Commands
- `/line:prep` - Sync state, show ready tasks
- `/line:cook` - Execute a task with guardrails
- `/line:serve` - AI peer review
- `/line:tidy` - Commit, sync, push
- `/line:work` - Full workflow cycle
